mapper.insert: insert into user( id, password, birthday, age, gender, nation, city, role ) value ( #{id}, #{password}, #{birthday}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{nation}, #{city}, #{role} )
mapper.update: update user set id = #{id}, password = #{password}, birthday = #{birthday}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, nation = #{nation}, city = #{city} role = #{role} where user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.delete: delete from user where id=#{id} and password = #{password}
mapper.select: select * from user where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
